Title: Crafting Orders: Jewelcrafting
Description:
So you are a jewelcrafter? You should have mentioned that earlier!

Let me send you to Makir, a jewelcrafter of great renown, who has a shop on the southern part of the Forgegrounds. I will mark it on your map. 

Makir has his very own jeweler's bench where you can review, craft, and deliver work orders from public lists and personal contacts like friends and guildmates. If you are lucky, you might come across an order from a renowned person that offers some extra rewards--or so I hear.
ObjectivesText: Find Makir in the Forgegrounds and use his jeweler's bench.
